Reviews.Title: “good value for low cost”
Reviews.Author: Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: reception check told reached hotel 2pm called reception told 5pm am supposed bags self checking machine tried machine 1 hour handle using machine check kept telling cant read atm card screen english atm machine tells enter atm pin english figure guessed requesting pin atm mastercard enter pic transaction maybe rules finally check nice hotel 37 euro bathroom nice mirrors street lots noise trains night 24 hours close window feel hot noise trains

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommend!”
Reviews.Author: Tomas M
Reviews.Content: highly recommend hotel self checkin clean equiped ac free wifi breakfast delicious parking free parking sbahn station 5 minutes walk tram stop takes 20 minutes alexanderplatz middle city deciding etap ost etap potsdamer platz advise choose ost 10 eurnight cheaper free parking distance city center

Reviews.Title: “Good location”
Reviews.Author: didowollongong
Reviews.Content: location day trip berlin 10 minute walk railway station theres tram close hotel catch train station wish night couldnt sleep due constant running noisy trams hotel hot window shut noisy requesting morning moved quieter cooler staff helpful directions car parking free short walk road hotel

Reviews.Title: “Poor location, no local facalities nearby”
Reviews.Author: seat_1A_traveller
Reviews.Content: etap hotel former east berlin government initiative industrial north east city 50 minutes airport 35 minutes central berlin basic free wifi internet access breakfast basic fills gap staff unfriendly pay 10euros night stay etap alexanderplatz instead

Reviews.Title: “Worst receptionist I have seen in my life”
Reviews.Author: Grotter_from_Ind Posted by an Accorhotels.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel receptionist helpful receptionist friendly cleaned properly 2nd day towels provided reception towels doesnt understand english cursing worst worst worst hotel stayed entire life
